title: Add standardized “Attribution Evidence” fields to Issue objects

sections.text: Introduce a lightweight, structured section on each Issue for attribution inputs (e.g., impacted accounts, revenue at risk, hypothesis of expected impact, and linked downstream work IDs). Ensure these fields are captured consistently from support/CRM/pipeline context and remain auditable over time. This establishes a shared baseline for later reporting so attribution debates can reference the same source-of-truth data.
